ISSUE.TITLE: Caching issue media-lib new folder
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Steps to reproduce: - Start with 0 folders - Upload a few images - Try to move a file from the list view and see there is no sub folder to move to - click “creat folder” fill and save the form - try to move the same file again - The select is still empty - Refresh the page - do the same operation and the select is now filled correctly

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: search by numeric numbers in a relation (#21873)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: fixed the caching issue in media-lib new folder #21367
